title: Weird connection problem
body: Hi, In my Previous game I had a connection problem where I freeze (unable to click abilities) but the surrounding map continues as normal (enemies attack me as I stand still and I see all of it no pause). My ping is normal for all that time. This is a weird connection problem, I encountered it at about 3:30am and it seems to happen only to me. I am still using old client. Does anybody know what is going on? I feel bad for giving my team a lose they didn't deserve. I dont think it is my net it has something to do with the game itself.

replies.body: yep getting something similar, more often than not i keep moving the direction i last clicked. but this is only for like 1-2 seconds. its so anoying. ping just say 34 whole time. like hasnt moved from 34 all month

Could you do the following for me,

* [Switch to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5)
* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and the direct url to your ICSI netalyzr results.
